title: Create shortcut on windows server 2019 to launch a website in Fire Fox
content: Trying to create a short cut on the Windows Server 2019 desktop so the shortcut launches a website in Fire Fox without setting Fire Fox as the default web browser. I have tried several ways without success. The server is being used as the master server in a Citrix environment and the users are expecting a near Windows 10 experience in their VDI. Any help would be appreciated
creator: markaz62

title: Program nonfunctioning
content: I have been using Firefox for years. Suddenly, when opened, ALL of the menu items are greyed out and non-responsive. I have tried reinstalling a couple of times, to no avail. I have no idea what is going on, and hope someone out there does! Thanks, David
